ftbquests.chapter.deeper_and_darker.titl: &3The Otherside: &0Deeper and Darker[--&3异界:&0更深更深,更暗--]
ftbquests.chapter.deeper_and_darker.ques: Found underground in the &aOverworld&r.[--在&a主世界&r下方发现.--]
Kill a Warden[--杀死一名监守者--]
Craft a &9Warden Helmet[--制作一个&9卫兵头盔--]
Used to negate the darkness in &8&lThe Otherside.[--用于在&8&l异界中消除黑暗。--]

Before lighting the portal, you must first remove all &3Sculk Veins &rfrom the inner frame. After the frame is cleared, you can right click it with the &bHeart of The Deep &rthat you got earlier from killing The Warden.[--在照明传送门之前,你必须先从内部框架移除所有&3史古克树脂&r.在框架清除后,你可以用你早期杀死监守者后获得的&b深渊之心&r右键单击它.--]
Kill a Shattered[--杀死一个破碎的--]
Rare chance of spawning after breaking an &8Ancient Vase&r.[--破坏&8古代花瓶&r后生成几率.--]
Kill a Stalker[--杀死一个尾行者--]
Kill a &7Shriek Worm[--杀死一个&7史莱克蠕虫--]
Found by stepping on Infested Sculk[--踩在感染史古克上获得--]
Kill a Shriek Worm[--杀死一只苦力怕虫--]
Find a &2Sculk Snapper[--找到一个&2骷髅捕捉者--]
Can be tamed with enchanted &cNetherite Chestplates&r. When tamed, they will occasionally drop enchanted books. [--可以用附魔&c下界合金胸甲&r驯服.驯服后,它们偶尔会掉落附魔书.--]
